narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Asc of New York, LLC is a Home Health provider based in Brooklyn, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $110.9M in Medicaid payments across 792K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $110.9M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,866 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
